name: Caislean: Paranormal
description:
Moloch Castle has a deep history and has recently gained attention through a viral video showcasing a haunting. It's up to the Ballymont Paranormal Group to investigate the castle. It appears that there is more than meets the eye... Place equipment and gadgets during the day in order to survive the threats of the night.

Featuring:
  • First Person day sections
  • Point and Click night sections
  • Custom Night game mode with 3 new enemy types

Investigate the castle during the day and place cameras, sensors, and snares throughout the explored environment. You must use your investigation skills to determine the locations of paranormal hotspots and find clues about countering new enemy types.

Unravel the mysterious downfall of the Moloch family and lay their souls to rest.

[** From the developer **]
This game was created over the course of 2.5 years by one person. Would love to hear constructive feedback!
